name: Fey
description: A blink dog runs through the wild. When upright; this card can refer to a Fey creature or a sense of whimsy; reversed, it points to the gloomy Shadowfell.

person.upright: A person with Fey ancestry or some other connection to the Fey (such as a warlock of the Archfey), or a person with a whimsical sense of humor.
person.reverse: A gloomy person with no sense of humor, or a person who uses shadow-based magic.

creatureTrap.upright: A Fey creature, or some other creature with connections to the Feywild.
creatureTrap.reverse: A creature from the Shadowfell, or one transformed by shadow energy (such as a shadow dragon).

place.upright: A place in the Feywild, somewhere that allows passage to the Feywild, or a location where Fey magic is active.
place.reverse: A place in the Shadowfell, somewhere that allows passage to the Shadowfell, or a location where shadow magic is active.

treasure.upright: An art object depicting Fey or the Feywild, or a magic item made by Fey.
treasure.reverse: An art object depicting the Shadowfell, or a magic item that uses shadow magic.

situation.upright: An absurd situation that shouldn't be taken too seriously.
situation.reverse: A gloomy situation that offers little hope of success or escape.
